name: Free Design System | Ui Kit
description:
A complete design system with over 100 components. Starting from basic ones such as buttons, checkboxes to comments and cookie windows🍪.


The system is built on Auto Layout and Variants.


Much attention is paid to adaptive tables and alignments in them.


✍️Write your opinion, I'm open to feedback.


😍 I'll be happy if you subscribe to me:

  • Instagram
  • Behance
  • Dribbble
  • Linkedin


This is your way of saying thank you for my work.
